name: Notice of Proceedings: NOP AE2: Personal service in the UK
body:
#Notice of proceedings 

Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name)),

Your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership)) has been checked by court staff and accepted. Your ((partner)) needs to be notified so they can respond.  

#What you need to do 
You need to 'serve' (send) the ((isDivorce??divorce papers))((isDissolution??papers to end your civil partnership)) to your ((partner)). This is because they live outside of England or Wales or because you have told the court that you want to arrange service of the documents yourself. You need to serve them before ((review deadline date)). 

1. You will receive a letter from HMCTS in the next few days, which has the documents that need to be sent to your ((partner)). These documents are the 'Notice of Proceedings' and a form which they can use to respond. 

2. Send the documents to your ((partner)). You can send them by post or scan them and attach them to an email. If you send them by email then you must also send them a copy by post. Make sure you keep  proof of delivery, which shows the date the documents were delivered.

3. Send an email to the court at divorcecase@justice.gov.uk with the following information:

*your case reference number: ((reference number))
* the date you served them
* the way you served them
* A ‘certificate of service’ (if you used a process server)

^If your ((partner)) does not respond then you may have to prove that that they have received the documents. You could use a ‘process server’ which is a privately-hired professional who will serve the documents for you and give you a ‘certificate of service’. This certificate proves that they have been served. If you want to use a process server then you can search for one online. 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
